Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I have been trying my hardest to build the RemoteTech Aeroprobe. But, first of all, I don't even know what the darn thing is supposed to look like when it is properly put together! I have googled it and looked for it on YouTube and everything an I cannot find a picture of it completed or a video of it anywhere. Can someone please point me in the right direction. Thanks so much!!

Cheers,

Happybone

Edited August 30, 2013 by Happybone

Ill try and help, the wings go on the side but they are folded up and twisted, (hehe) so put them on so the wings are flat against the body of the probe, and the engines will be pointing in the wrong direction but once deployed they will be correct, the wheels are kind of backwards also instead of attaching the landing strut first the wheel hits the body first, then the wheel is deployed down the strut to the correct place. I hope this kind of helps.
